altername_name: Heavenly Symphony: Formula One World Championship 1993
name: Formula One World Championship: Beyond the Limit
overview: Beyond the Limit is a racing sim based on Formula One circa 1993. It features real-life cars, tracks, and drivers from the world of F1. The graphics in Beyond the Limit are created from scaled and rotated sprites that create a 3D effect. It also features a lot of full-screen video clips taken from Fuji TV's coverage of actual races.
